nodes.text: Gartro egg salad sandwich was a type of sandwich served at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. It consisted of hard-boiled grade aurek gartro eggs, tangy emulsauce, Boontaspiced mustard, Taba leaves, Serrian salt and black hole pepper all on either a toasted or therm-zapped piece of Pseudograin bread. It cost 5.5 credits.
